headline: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (JPM) Exploring Issuing Cryptocurrency-Backed Loans
summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) is one of the best 52-week high stocks to buy now. On July 22, it emerged that the company is exploring the possibility of offering loans backed by clients’ cryptocurrency holdings. The company could offer loans backed by Bitcoin and Ethereum as early as next year. JPMorgan’s offering of loans […]

headline: Senior Scams Are More Sophisticated Than Ever. How to Protect People You Care About.

headline: JPMorgan Announces Cash Distributions for the JPMorgan ETFs
summary: TORONTO, July 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- J. P. Morgan Asset Management (JPMAM)* today announced the final July 2025 cash distributions for the below listed JPMorgan ETFs. The JPMorgan ETFs trade on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX). Unitholders of record on August 1, 2025 will receive cash distributions payable on August 8, 2025. Details of the “per unit” distributions are as follows: JPMorgan ETF nameTicker symbolDistribution per unit ($)Payment frequencyJPMorgan US Equity Premium Income Activ
